summary.para: The MONITORINFO structure contains information about a display monitor.
The GetMonitorInfo function stores information in aMONITORINFO structure or a structure.
TheMONITORINFO structure is a subset of the structure. TheMONITORINFOEX structure adds a string member to contain a name for the display monitor.
The size of the structure, in bytes.
Set this member to sizeof ( MONITORINFO ) before calling the function. Doing so lets the function determine the type of structure you are passing to it.

member.name: MONITORINFO.rcMonitor
member.summary: A structure that specifies the display monitor rectangle, expressed in virtual-screen coordinates. Note that if the monitor is not the primary display monitor, some of the rectangle's coordinates may be negative values.

member.name: MONITORINFO.rcWork
member.summary: A structure that specifies the work area rectangle of the display monitor, expressed in virtual-screen coordinates. Note that if the monitor is not the primary display monitor, some of the rectangle's coordinates may be negative values.

summary.para: A set of flags that represent attributes of the display monitor.

listheader.description: This is the primary display monitor.
